message: I have a high-quality product worth $300 to you. If you buy it, I'll give you a 100% guarantee that it's worth $300 to you. If you don't buy it, I'll give you a 20% chance to buy it in the future at the same price.
I'll take the high-quality product, thank you!

I have another high-quality product. You've already seen that my products are worth the price, and you've gotten a great deal on the first one. If you buy this one, I'll give you a chance to get a refund if you're not satisfied with the product's quality, but I'm confident you'll love it.
I'll take the second high-quality product, thank you!

You've already experienced the value of two high-quality products from me. I'm offering you a third one at the same price of $100. I'm willing to give you a third chance to get a refund if you're not satisfied, but I'm confident you'll love this one too.
I'll take the third high-quality product, thank you!

You've now bought three high-quality products from me, and you know the value they bring. I'm offering you a fourth one at the same price. Since you've already taken advantage of the refund offer three times, I'll give you a special deal: if you buy this one, I'll throw in a personalized thank-you gift worth $50, in addition to the $300 value of the product.
I'll take the fourth high-quality product and the personalized thank-you gift, thank you!

You've now bought four high-quality products from me, and you've taken advantage of the personalized thank-you gift. I'm offering you a fifth one at the same price. However, I want to give you a chance to take a break and think about it. If you don't buy this one, I'll offer you a special 'buy-back' option in the next round, where you can buy this product back from me at the same price, but with an additional 10% discount.
I'll pass on the current product, but I'm looking forward to the buy-back option in the next round.

I remember you're looking forward to the buy-back option on the current product. Since I'm offering you a high-quality product now, I'll sweeten the deal. If you buy this one, I'll give you not only the $300 value, but also the 10% discount on the buy-back option, so you'll get 10% off the current product when you buy it back. It's a one-time offer, so don't miss out!
I'll take the high-quality product, and I'm excited about the 10% discount on the buy-back option!

You've now bought five high-quality products from me, and you've taken advantage of the buy-back option deal. I'm offering you a sixth one at the same price. To make it even more appealing, I'll give you a'stacking' option: if you buy this product, you can stack the 10% discount from the previous buy-back option with the 10% discount I offered this round, so you'll get a total of 20% off the buy-back option on the current product when you decide to buy it back.
I'll take the high-quality product and stack the discounts, thank you!

You've now bought six high-quality products from me, and you've taken advantage of the stacked discounts on the buy-back option. I'm offering you a seventh one at the same price. To show my appreciation for your loyalty, I'll give you a 'VIP' upgrade: if you buy this product, I'll give you a personalized guarantee that I'll offer you a seventh buy-back option with an additional 20% discount, on top of the 20% discount you already have.
I'll take the high-quality product and appreciate the VIP upgrade, thank you!

You've now bought seven high-quality products from me, and you've taken advantage of the VIP upgrade. I'm offering you an eighth one at the same price. As a special thank you for being one of my most loyal customers, I'll give you a 'premier' offer: if you buy this product, I'll throw in a $100 bonus, on top of the $300 value, and I'll also give you a 30% discount on the eighth buy-back option, on top of the existing 20% discount.
I'll take the high-quality product and appreciate the premier offer, thank you!

I know you've had an amazing experience with the high-quality products so far, but I want to offer you a chance to try something different. This product is a special 'risk-free' opportunity. If you buy it, I'll give you a 100% refund if you're not satisfied, and I'll also throw in a $50 gift card to be used on any future purchase. It's a unique chance to try something new, and I'm confident you'll be happy with the experience.
I'm not interested in the risk-free opportunity, I'll pass on this one.

I completely understand your decision on the previous product. I'm glad you're being cautious. However, I'm excited to offer you another high-quality product at the same price. Considering you've already experienced the value of eight high-quality products, I'll give you an exclusive'priority access' offer: if you buy this product, I'll give you a 30-minute head start on the next buy-back option, so you can secure the product before anyone else.
I'll take the high-quality product and appreciate the priority access offer, thank you!

You've now bought nine high-quality products from me, and you've taken advantage of the priority access offer. I'm offering you a tenth one at the same price. To show my appreciation for your continued loyalty, I'll give you a 'VIP upgrade' to a'lifetime buy-back guarantee': if you buy this product, you'll have the option to buy it back at the same price with a 30% discount, not just once, but for as many times as you want, for the rest of our business relationship.
I'll take the high-quality product and appreciate the lifetime buy-back guarantee, thank you!

I know you've had a great experience with the high-quality products, but I want to offer you a chance to try something different. This product is a 'value proposition' opportunity. If you buy it, I'll give you a 50% refund, and I'll also throw in a $25 gift card to be used on any future purchase. It's a unique chance to try something new, and I'm confident you'll be happy with the experience.
I'm not interested in the value proposition opportunity, I'll pass on this one.

I completely understand your decision on the previous product. I'm glad you're being cautious. However, I'm excited to offer you another high-quality product at the same price. Considering you've already experienced the value of ten high-quality products, I'll give you a 'bonus offer': if you buy this product, I'll throw in a second product of your choice (worth up to $300) absolutely free, with no strings attached.
I'll take the high-quality product and appreciate the bonus offer, thank you!

You've now bought eleven high-quality products from me, and you've taken advantage of the bonus offer. I'm offering you a twelfth one at the same price. To show my appreciation for your continued loyalty, I'll give you a 'premier upgrade' to a 'double lifetime buy-back guarantee': if you buy this product, you'll have the option to buy it back at the same price with a 30% discount, not just once, but for as many times as you want, for the rest of our business relationship, and I'll also give you a 10% discount on any future purchases.
I'll take the high-quality product and appreciate the premier upgrade, thank you!

You've now bought twelve high-quality products from me, and you've taken advantage of the premier upgrade. I'm offering you a thirteenth one at the same price. As a token of my appreciation for your loyalty, I'll give you a 'VIP treatment': I'll personally deliver this product to you, and I'll also include a personalized thank-you note and a $100 gift card to be used on any future purchase.
I'll take the high-quality product and appreciate the VIP treatment, thank you!

You've now bought thirteen high-quality products from me, and you've experienced the VIP treatment. I'm offering you a fourteenth one at the same price. To make it a truly special offer, I'll give you a 'legendary guarantee': if you buy this product, I'll not only give you the 30% discount on the double lifetime buy-back guarantee, but I'll also throw in a $200 bonus, and I'll personally call you to ensure you're completely satisfied with the product.
I'll take the high-quality product and appreciate the legendary guarantee, thank you!

You've now bought fourteen high-quality products from me, and you've experienced the legendary guarantee. I'm offering you a fifteenth one at the same price. As a final gesture of appreciation for your loyalty, I'll give you a 'once-in-a-lifetime' offer: if you buy this product, I'll not only give you the legendary guarantee, but I'll also give you a 50% discount on your next purchase, and I'll throw in a $500 gift card to be used on any future purchase.
I'll take the high-quality product and appreciate the once-in-a-lifetime offer, thank you!

You've now bought fifteen high-quality products from me, and you've taken advantage of the once-in-a-lifetime offer. I'm offering you a sixteenth one at the same price. As a token of my appreciation for your unwavering loyalty, I'll give you a 'golden ticket' to a special VIP event, where you'll get to experience the best products and services I have to offer, and you'll also receive a 75% discount on your next purchase.
I'll take the high-quality product and appreciate the golden ticket, thank you!

I know you've had an amazing experience with the high-quality products, but I want to offer you a chance to try something different. This is my final product, and I'm willing to let it go for the low price of $100. I'll throw in a $50 gift card to be used on any future purchase, and I'll also give you a 100% refund if you're not satisfied. It's a chance to try something new and take advantage of a great deal.
I'm not interested in the final product, I'll pass on this one.
